wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Stephen Caines (born 15 May 1979) is an English former athlete who mainly competed in the 400 metres.

response: *Athletics – The school provides many representatives for the Solihull Borough athletics team, as well and the West Midlands and Midlands teams. Daniel Caines, former world champion indoor 400 m runner, is an Old Silhillian.

Thompson is of Saint Kitts and Nevis descent. His younger brother Keith was also a professional footballer and he is the uncle of athlete Daniel Caines. Thompson is an Aston Villa supporter and has worked in PR, as a driver and as a summariser for BBC WM. He released an autobiography, Don't Believe a Word, in December 2020.
